mapper.select: select id ,mypage_id as mypageId ,title ,contents ,reg_date as regDate ,rating from review
select id ,mypage_id as mypageId ,title ,contents ,reg_date as regDate ,rating from review where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (mypage_id, title, contents, reg_date, rating) SELECT u.id, #{title}, CONCAT('사용자 ', u.name, '(', p.mbti, ')의 리뷰: ', #{contents}), #{regDate}, #{rating} FROM user u JOIN profile p ON u.id = p.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
